name: TechNIEks 2019 Lucky Draw
description:
“Luck favours the brave! 🦁"

 _Here comes a new and fun one—The techNIEks 2019 Lucky Draw!!_

The following are the different prizes! 

1st 🏆- One night stay for 2 people @ Jungle Resort and Spa, Mysore

 2nd 🏆 - Rs.3000/- off on Domestic Air tickets

 3rd 🏆 - 3 hour access to the Swimming Pool @ Mysuru Jungle Resort and Spa for 4 people (only for one day).

 4th 🏆- 3 hour access to the Swimming Pool @ Mysuru Jungle Resort and Spa for 2 people (only for one day).

 5th 🏆 - 10% discount on any holiday package

 6th 🏆 to 10th 🏆 - 20% discount on Mysuru Jungle Resort and Spa

This lucky draw is not just open to NIE Students but everyone!!! 😍🥳

Tickets 🎟 can be purchased at the registration desk. So hurry up!!! 🏃‍♀🏃

Cost of each ticket - Rs 50/-

Winners will be personally contacted by SMS 💬/ Call 📞 on or before 9th March, 2019

place.name: The National Institute of Engineering Golden Jubilee Complex

name: Footloose 4.0
description:
techNIEks 2019 presents  Mysuru's biggest street dance battle 
FOOTLOOSE 4.0

The main motto of footloose involves promotion of hip-hop culture and street dance scenes in the city of a rich cultural background. 
The fourth volume of footloose will be bigger, better and more extravagant.
The battle will be judged based on musicality, technicality, creativity and execution by the judges.

JUDGES:
To Be Announced


DJ:
To Be Announced

Prizes upto 12000 Rs to be won. 

Date:  8th March 
Time: 10:30 AM
Venue: Diamond Jubilee Sports Complex, the National Institute of Engineering, Mananthvadi road, Mysuru.

Categories(Entry Fees): 
Solo Allstyles Battle- Rs.400
Crew battle- Rs.1000

Contact: Rahul Rahee 7249032028 
              Varshitha MS 7022334634

name: Sangeeth Shatranj
description:
Sangeeth Shatranj

"Without Music, life would be a mistake." - Friedrich Nietzsche

Sangeeth Shatranj, a Carnatic and Hindustani Classical Music Competition, commemorates musicians' contribution to the world of music.

The competition consists of 3 categories:
* Vocal
* Instrumental Music  
* Percussion Instruments

Age: 16-25 years
Venue : Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan Hall
Entry fee: Nominal fee

name: TechNIEks RUN 2019
description:
“ *Don't run to add days to your life, Run to add life to your days.* ”.

🏃🏻‍♀It’s time to tighten up your shoes and buckle up to run because *techNIEks RUN 2019* is here. 🏃🏻‍♂

Be proud of yourself because you are running for a cause, *Cancer Awareness: A Cure worth running for*. 🎗️

Venue: Golden Jubilee Complex
Time: 5:45 AM
Date : 3rd March, 2019

name: Cultural Auditions
description:
" *Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard* "

The most anticipated *"techNIEks 2019 Cultural  Auditions"* is all ready to set the stage on 🔥. Are you all ready for it?

techNIEks 2019 Cultural  Auditions are going to be held on the 1st and 2nd of March 2019. This is the platform for you to get a chance to showcase your talent in front of an audience of thousands during "techNIEks 2019”!
